resources.string:
You will have 2 minutes to show what you know. 

Each question can be attempted only one time during a single game.

After selecting an Answer, you must confirm your answer before moving to the next question.

The game will end when either all of the questions have been submitted, or when time runs out.

Questions not completed or confirmed in time will be marked incorrect.

The player with the highest score will be declared the winner

Press continue when you are ready to begin.

 Good Luck !!!
